mapper.select: select member.usermail, userpw, username, usersex, userage, usernick, regdate, updatedate, defaultkey, status, userlevel, auth, uno from tbl_member member left outer join tbl_member_auth auth on member.usermail = auth.usermail where member.usermail = #{usermail}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (usermail, username, userpw, usernick, usersex, userage) values (#{usermail}, #{username}, #{userpw}, #{usernick}, #{usersex}, #{userage})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set usernick=#{usernick}, usersex=#{usersex}, userage=#{userage} where usermail=#{usermail}
mapper.delete: update tbl_member set del=1 where usermail=#{usermail}
mapper.update: Update tbl_member SET defaultkey = '1' WHERE usermail = #{usermail}
update tbl_member set defaultkey = #{defaultkey} WHERE usermail = #{usermail}
update tbl_member set defaultkey = '0' where usermail = #{usermail}
